lead_paragraph: Tim Howard made two saves in the penalty shootout and the Colorado Rapids beat the Los Angeles Galaxy 3-1 on penalties Sunday to advance to the Western Conference championship.

headline.print_headline: Howard Makes 2 Saves in Penalty Shootout, Rapids Advance
headline.main: Howard Makes 2 Saves in Penalty Shootout, Rapids Advance

snippet: Tim Howard made two saves in the penalty shootout and the Colorado Rapids beat the Los Angeles Galaxy 3-1 on penalties Sunday to advance to the Western Conference championship....
